public class BasicQueryBondSpecification
extends Object
implements Serializable, QueryBondSpecification

Bond specification of a SMARTS bond expression.

Field Detail

bond

public QueryBond bond
Representation of the SMARTS bond expression.

destination

public int destination
Index of the SMARTS atom expression which is the destination of this bond expression.

grow

public boolean grow
Growing evaluation flag. true if this bond expression should evaluate the destination atom expression or false if the destination atom expression has already been evaluated. If false only the bond expression is evaluated (faster), typically the closure bond of a ring.

source

public int source
Index of the SMARTS atom expression which is the source of this bond expression.

visit

public int visit
Visited flag.
